name: Who Said It? "Ocean's Eleven" and "Ocean's Twelve" Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Tess.

	After getting out of jail in "Ocean's Eleven", Danny went to see Tess at the Bellagio Casino. While they were talking about Tess's new boyfriend, Terry Benedict, Danny asked Tess if Terry made her laugh and Tess responded with this observation.

Linus.

	When Linus made this comment on "Ocean's Twelve", he and Tess were walking through a press gaggle at the museum. They were pulling off the fake heist of a Fabergé egg and used Tess' resemblance to Julia Roberts as part of the plan to get in to see the egg. Since Julia Roberts was pregnant at the time, Tess also had to be pregnant.

questions.text: "Oh! Oh he's mean. He's just mean spirited. All right, how many espressos have you had?"
questions.explanation:
Rusty.

	Rusty made this remark on "Ocean's Twelve" after Danny woke him up at 11:30, the night before the failed attempt at the fake Fabergé egg heist. Danny had been woken up by the Night Fox, who was pretending to be the 5:30 wake-up call, and he had to drink five espressos to get himself awake.

Danny.

	Danny made this remark to Linus on "Ocean's Eleven". Linus was wanting a bigger part in the heist of three of Terry Benedict's casinos. Rusty was close by when Danny made the comment and told Linus to reverse what Danny told him.

questions.text: "You have three pairs. You can't have three pairs. You can't have six cards in a five card game."
questions.explanation:
Rusty.

	When Rusty was first introduced on "Ocean's Eleven", he was teaching five TV stars to play poker. When Shane West laid down his cards, Rusty told him that he had three pairs and that was impossible, since he was playing with five cards. Shane West played Eli Sammler on "Once and Again".

questions.text: "Doesn't this guy believe in fresh air?"
questions.explanation:
Virgil.

	On "Ocean's Twelve", Rusty and Virgil Malloy were discussing how to get into a very rich agoraphobic's house to steal a map. They figured out that the only entrance into the house was through a second story window that was opened for fresh air.

questions.text: "You look down, they know you're lying, and up, they know you don't know the truth. Don't use seven words when four will do. Don't shift your weight, look always at your mark but don't stare, be specific but not memorable, be funny but don't make him laugh."
questions.explanation:
Rusty.

	As part of the casino heist on "Ocean's Eleven", Linus was to go in as an agent of the gaming commission and bust Frank (Bernie Mac). Rusty coached Linus on how to talk to Terry Benedict when they met.

Danny.

	In "Ocean's Twelve", Danny woke Rusty up at 11:30 and they couldn't go back to sleep, so they watched "Happy Days" in Italian in Rusty's hotel room.

questions.text: "Look, it's not in my nature to be mysterious. But I can't talk about it and I can't talk about why."
questions.explanation:
Rusty.

	On "Ocean's Twelve", while they were at the train station, Linus wanted to know if Rusty thought Tess looked like Julia Roberts. Rusty told him not to mention that fact to Tess. He couldn't tell Linus why Tess wouldn't talk about her resemblance to Julia Roberts. Julia Roberts' name was never mentioned in the brief conversation, but it was inferred.

questions.text: "There's a ninety-five pound Chinese man with a hundred sixty million dollars behind this door."
questions.explanation:
Danny.

	On "Ocean's Eleven", Linus and Danny had just gotten to the doors of the Bellagio vault, when Danny mentioned that Yen was in the vault with the money. Linus's reaction was, "Let's get him out."
